pullRequest.title: serialization updates and expandable-enum
pullRequest.bodyText:
Serialization updates:

Update Jackson adapter to register threeten adapters.
Adding SerializerAdapter::serializeList(List, CollectionFormat) method.
Updating DateTimeRfc1123 to use threeten types.
OkHttpHeaders are not serializable, hence convert it to a map and then serialize.

expandable enum

Adding ExpandableEnum for extensible enum.

nodes.bodyText: SerializationFeature.WRITE_DATES_AS_TIMESTAMPS feature is disabled for Azure use-cases hence removing check for it.
